entry: It's a bts song. Love takes part in your self-answer album.

It's called a Japanese animation character, meaning "bread man." The incredibly popular Japanese children, like our pikachu, are the baikinman who is the biggest enemy of this character, the germ man with pictures of every child's item on it.
I think his head was made of bread, and his other friends were made of curry or something. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=perpumhcel4
The guy with the bean jam cookie, a comic book and a cartoon series that was once more famous than the hello kitty.
